name: Task Accountability
description: Enforces task accountability by requiring GitHub issues for all work

strictMode.description: If true, block responses without GitHub issue references. If false, just warn.

issuePatterns.description: Additional patterns that indicate GitHub issue references

exemptPatterns.description: Patterns for responses that don't require GitHub issues (e.g., simple questions)

minTaskDurationSeconds.description: Only require issues for tasks longer than this (based on tool calls)

instructions.description: Custom instructions to inject (string), or false to disable instruction injection

instructionsFile.description: Path to markdown file containing custom instructions (overrides inline)
